amendatorysection.catchline: Handicapped or disabled persons; parking permit; rules and regulations.
amendatorysection.para: (1) This section applies beginning on the implementation date designated by the director under section 60-3,113.01.

(2) The department may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations necessary to fulfill any duties and obligations as provided in sections 60-3,113.01 to 60-3,113.08. All rules and regulations of the department adopted pursuant to section 18-1742 prior to the implementation date designated by the director under section 60-3,113.01 shall continue to be effective until revised, amended, repealed, or nullified pursuant to law.
